author: Simon Difford
description: The original may have been equal parts gin, 30 Galliano and 30 Drambuie but Scotch whisky sits more harmoniously as the base spirit, so harmoniously that I've added a splash more of it.
name: Golden Glow
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
